**Crash logs**
Please attach the system crash logs to this bug. Open the Console app, click Crash Reports in the sidebar, and select any with Mimestream in the title. You can drag them out to a folder on your Desktop. GitHub unfortunately does not support attaching .crash files natively â€“ please zip them or rename them to have a .txt extension.  

**To Reproduce**
If you know how to reproduce this crash, please fill in steps: 
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. Crash

**Configuration:**
 - OS: [e.g. macOS Big Sur]
 - Mimestream Version [e.g. v0.6.25]
